== Gnome AT configuration re-factoring ==

''On this page we will identify the current assistive technology configuration options in Gnome and suggest ways in which they may be regrouped.'' See the <nowiki>[[Accessibility/Specs/CommonATConfig|CommonATConfig spec]]</nowiki>.
